title: Tracy Morgan | Sarah Sanders Says Congress Is Not "Smart Enough" for Trump's Tax Returns: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at President Trump still resisting calls to release his tax returns while complaining about immigration laws.

Then, Tracy Morgan talks about The Last O.G., Father’s Day and his new hobby: shredding important documents. He also takes a few more questions backstage at Studio 8G.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
